Author: softcoffee
Text: I'm sorry about your relapse. Know that you're not alone.  I understand and relate to the things you said. I feel just like this right now. I've gone back to restrictive behaviors very recently and I dread the thought of losing this. My head feels numb, I can just float through life and focus on the task at hand without feeling paralyzed by my emotions. You're right, is comforting. Comfort and calm is exactly what I feel right now, and I fear losing that again.   I don't know what to say other than...I know what its like, and  I'm here. No pressure, but DM me if you ever want to talk. ‚ù§
